products.title: Galaxy Z Fold6 5G
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold6 5G is a premium foldable smartphone featuring a large foldable Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, powerful performance, and multitasking support.

products.title: OnePlus 15
products.description: The OnePlus 15 is a high-performance flagship smartphone offering a smooth AMOLED display, fast charging, and a powerful processor for gaming and multitasking.

products.title: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion 5G
products.description: The Motorola Edge 60 Fusion 5G is a stylish smartphone with a curved OLED display, 5G connectivity, a strong camera setup, and a clean Android experience.

products.title: Motorola G35
products.description: The Motorola G35 is a budget-friendly smartphone featuring a large display, reliable performance for daily use, and a long-lasting battery.

products.title: Redmi A4 5G
products.description: The Redmi A4 5G is an affordable 5G smartphone offering a smooth display, decent performance for everyday tasks, and a big battery for long usage.

products.title: iQOO Z10x 5G
products.description: The iQOO Z10x 5G is a premium flagship smartphone featuring a Super Retina XDR display, powerful A-series performance, and an advanced camera system.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy M36 5G is a next-generation flagship smartphone with a high-refresh AMOLED display, top-tier cameras, strong performance, and 5G connectivity.

products.title: Apple iPhone Air
products.description: The Apple iPhone Air is a premium smartphone designed for smooth performance, stunning display quality, and powerful photography features with iOS experience.
